arframer 0.0.1
  • Reference

Functions

Source: R/dependency.R
arframer.Rd

Attach aframer and arframer dependency, primitives and embed.

arframer_dependency(cdn = FALSE)

ar_scene(
  ...,
  cdn = FALSE,
  arjs = aframer::opts_aframe(debugUIEnabled = "false")
)

embed_arframer(ar)

ar_marker_camera(...)

ar_marker(...)

a_marker_camera(...)

Arguments

cdn

Wether to use local of CDN for source files.
...

Any aframer element or option.
arjs

AR.js options.
ar

And arframer scene.

Examples

# use the primitive
ar_scene()

#> <a-scene arjs="debugUIEnabled: false;"></a-scene>

# OR
library(aframer)

a_scene(
  a_dependency(), # aframe dependency
  arframer_dependency(), # arframer dependency
  arjs = NA
)

#> <a-scene arjs></a-scene>
